invalid.min-max: The maximum value cannot be less than to the minimum value

list.title: Places
list.description: Discover the most popular places all over Turkey with Turistikrota. Find the best venues with hand-picked venue recommendations, filtering options by category, and user reviews.
list.keywords: places, turistikrota, places in Turkey, Turkey
list.descriptionWithCity: {{city}} is one of the most popular cities in Turkey. Discover the most popular places in {{city}} with Turistikrota. Find the best venues with hand-picked venue recommendations, filtering options by category, and user reviews.
list.descriptionWithType: Discover the most popular places in {{type}} with Turistikrota. Find the best venues with hand-picked venue recommendations, filtering options by category, and user reviews.
list.descriptionWithCityAndType: {{type}} is one of the most popular places in {{city}}. Discover the most popular places in {{city}} with Turistikrota. Find the best venues with hand-picked venue recommendations, filtering options by category, and user reviews.

features.core: This feature verified by our team.
